issue.title: mail not sent when using wps setorder request

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

-Actually, *it's not a defect*.- 

-the mail is not send on purpose since it is an automatic extraction and, thus, should not need manual intervention.-
-if mails are sent, we have by ASIT VD providers who would receives 100 emails per day. Not what they need :-)-


-What is you use case Thomas ?-


After a call with Thomas, I interpreted wrong the ticket. This case is specific to the WPS (not the REST connector) and concerns email notification to users (the clients) , not providers.
My apologize...

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

no problem, my description of the issue was not really clear...
